trustfund:
TF054239-GEF3 PDF B - MAURITANIA:
            COMMUNITY BASED WATERSHED MANAGEMENT PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Community-Based
            Watershed Management Project for Mauritania is to lessen the
            incidence of land degradation at the watershed level within
            the project areas by assisting rural communities to realize
            the benefits through community-driven investments,
            addressing land degradation and promoting sustainable land
            management practices. Some of the environmental impacts
            include: soil degradation, water pollution, air pollution,
            noise nuisance, natural habitats, fauna and flora,
            communities, and health. Mitigating measures are in the
            areas of construction, material treatment, latrine
            implementation, vegetation, reforestation, measures to
            protect cultural heritage, transport material regulations,
            water management, and conflict resolution.
